Action.Name: DlgStaticText.GetProperties
Action.Description: Gets the properties of a static text control on the current screen.

Arg.Name: ControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the static text control whose properties you want.

Action.Name: DlgStaticText.SetProperties
Action.Description: Sets the properties of a static text control on the current screen.

Arg.Name: ControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the static text control whose properties you want to set.

Arg.Name: Properties
Arg.Description: A table containing the static text control properties to set indexed by "Text" and "Visible".
